name: WMS Slots Super Jackpot Party
summary:
Win the thrill of the season! Escape the cold with the bright lights & fun spins of real Vegas slots, right on your phone or iPad!

Play real Vegas slot machines for free – anytime, anywhere! The Jackpot Party never stops.

Top 3 Features of Jackpot Party Casino:
 1. Authentic Vegas experience - with throwback slot machines & all that razzle dazzle
 2. Free slots, specifically designed for the slot machine loving connoisseur
 3. Online casino tournaments, huge progressive jackpots & daily coins bonuses

The more you spin, the more you could win!
Your 3D free video slot experience includes the chance to play for HUGE progressive jackpots & bonuses every step of the way. And, your Jackpot Party bonus increases as you play video slot machine games. With super fun online casino tournaments and regular slots promotions, Jackpot Party is your ultimate social casino & slot machine playground! Get the best 777 casino fun today!

Jackpot Party Vibes Never Stop!
 • Play branded casino slots overloaded with exciting minigames
 • Experience 3D video slots with huge progressive jackpot action & mega coin bonuses
 • Treat yourself to a game of Zeus II, Fu Dao Le, Super Monopoly Slots, Gorilla Chief, Invaders from the Planet Moolah, Reel Rich Devil, and many more free slots games!

Even more dazzling Jackpot Party features:
 • Bonus slots & Promo slot unlocks – Bet BIG to WIN Big! 
 • Promo WMS slot machine games – multiply your winnings
 •Gift Exchanges - send free virtual coins & other casino perks to your friends!

Join the Jackpot Party for non-stop Vegas slot game fun!

All in-game sales are final.
Note: Guest account does NOT merge with Facebook account
The games are intended for an adult audience. (i.e., intended for use by those 21 or older) 
The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
